title: wtf
body: playing a game with ETHERNET CABLE, i never have lagg using this i always use this. Im playing a game and suddenly i have 'reconnecting to server' trying to relog 20 times doesnt work and i cant connect :)

replies.body:

I checked network and run your utility. but no issues. Game seems according to third party website still be ongoing. Funny is that game was almost finished and should have completed without me either way. 

I cant connect to game cant join new game. :) please research.
No , i can still talk to my friend in TS and its a game issue many ppl cant reconect

It sounds like something happened with your network that's now failing to connect to the game server.  If you're still having this issue, go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix things up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
